title: Windows 11 build 22000.706 comes to Insiders with Windows spotlight for desktop
content:
Today, Microsoft is releasing Windows 11 build 22000.706 to the Release Preview channel of the Insider Program. As usual, the channel is reserved for cumulative updates that are slated to eventually roll out to the public. Non-Insiders will see this as an optional update in a week or two, and then the fixes that are

The post Windows 11 build 22000.706 comes to Insiders with Windows spotlight for desktop appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft is releasing a new cumulative update, and it contains a few new features, such as Windows Spotlight on the desktop.
